nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 10/26/23
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2023-10-26 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

## Current Agenda: 

- UID extension discussion
- Discuss meeting time 
- Open floor! Let's talk glTF extensions!

## Archive Agenda

* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).
discussion around uid as an extension. A proposal draft spec would be a great next step here so it can be experimented with.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 10/5/23
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2023-10-05 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

## Current Agenda: 

- Review KHR_audio

## Archive Agenda

* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).

1. Physics: No changes by aaronfranke.
2. Audio: Extensions beyond the base spec
3.2.a Audio: Discussed how audio base spec only can use mp3 and wav. Ogg was suggested except for safari. The rest requires a codec implementation

Brief notes:

1. Physics: No changes by aaronfranke.
2. Audio: Extensions beyond the base spec
3. Audio: Discussed how audio base spec only can use mp3 and wav. Ogg was suggested except for Safari's lack of support. All other audio codecs requires a codec implementation per platform.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 09/21/23 (2023-09-21)
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2023-09-21 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

## Current Agenda: 

* Review `Fix OMI_physics_joint referring to outdated body types` #192
* Review [MSFT_physics](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics)
  * [glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter)
  * [glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer)

## Pending Agenda

* Show and tell
* Create next weeks agenda

## Archive Agenda

* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 09/07/23
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 08/31/2023 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.


## Agenda: 
- Let's continue talk physics
- - https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics/issues/23

## Backlog:
* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* OMI / MX Components Extension
* We discussed https://openmv.org (Open Metaverse Foundation) and how we can synergize with their efforts. Should we make a showcase of our projects to open up a broader discussion?
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [EXT_skin_humanoid](https://github.com/takahirox/EXT_skin_humanoid)
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* Review [MSFT_physics](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics)
  * [glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter)
  * [glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer)
* Licensing Extension https://twitter.com/superhoge/status/1596757861882740736
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)
* [Third Room Extensions](https://github.com/matrix-org/thirdroom/pull/469)
* [glXF](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glXF/blob/main/specification/2.0/README.md)
* Show and tell
* Create next weeks agenda

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).
